replies.author: green丶bastard
replies.txt_content:
纯粹语法错误
Herobrine is WATCHING you
然后the God The必须大写

Is time for magic- IT IS time for magic
You find notch - you FOUND NOTCH

而且这些应该是一个网站生成的 当然ps非常简单
